item.title: Goodbye, Eri: Not Remembering Others, but Knowing Oneself
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Behind every act of madness lies a resilient and pure heart. The key to understanding ‘Goodbye, Eri’ is not about remembering others but realizing Yuta was filming himself all along. Words fail to convey how much effort I’ve poured into loving this world.

item.title: The Dawn of Farewell - Binding the Flower of Promises on the Morning of Parting
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: An analysis of “The Dawn of Farewell - Binding the Flower of Promises on the Morning of Parting”. The theme of the movie is not just about maternal love; maternal love is merely one aspect of parting.

item.title: Penguin Highway: The Journey of a Boy Growing Up
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Penguin Highway: The Journey of a Boy Growing Up
